Letter M 𒈠 MA 𒈠 ≈ 𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒀼𒁹 ≠ 𒑑 ≠ 𒃲 megalo

𒈠 Marine 𒈣 𒊏 MA.ra = ship SI 𒋛 = Kahn ⋍ Horn 𓄏

𒈠 MAʳ 𒈢 مەروو merû mer, μῆλον mêlon, mālum, manzana, alma, marble: 𒈠 MAʳ 𒈢 hašhur ܚܙܘܪܐ ḥazzūrā "apple" waterfruit

𒈠 ha.ma home 𓉔 house 𒂷 ĝa

𒌋𒌋𒁕𒀜𒌓 man-da-at-tú mandate "payment, tribute" 𒈠𒁕𒀜𒋫 maⁿda-at-tú manudatum "payment, tribute" 𓂟𓂞
